class aria.parser.modeling.ModelingContext¶

Bases: object

Modeling context.

Variables:
  • template (aria.modeling.models.ServiceTemplate) – generated service template
  • instance (aria.modeling.models.Service) – generated service instance
  • node_id_format (basestring) – format for node instance IDs
  • id_type (basestring) – type of IDs to use for instances
  • id_max_length (int) – maximum allowed instance ID length
  • inputs ({basestring, object}) – inputs values
